original_title: UFC Fight Night 57: Edgar vs. Swanson
overview: UFC Fight Night 57: Edgar vs. Swanson was a mixed martial arts event held at the Frank Erwin Center in Austin, Texas, on November 22, 2014. The card was headlined by a Featherweight bout between Cub Swanson and Frankie Edgar.
title: UFC Fight Night 57: Edgar vs. Swanson
